```scss
// Property: pluginState
// Description: Determines how to treat content that requires plugins in this web view.
// Component(s): Ti.UI.WebView
'.plugin-state-webview-plugins-off': { pluginState: Ti.UI.Android.WEBVIEW_PLUGINS_OFF }
'.plugin-state-webview-plugins-on': { pluginState: Ti.UI.Android.WEBVIEW_PLUGINS_ON }
'.plugin-state-webview-plugins-on-demand': { pluginState: Ti.UI.Android.WEBVIEW_PLUGINS_ON_DEMAND }
```
